nodes.text: So how are things with you today?
Great! I've got a new song -

It's scary and it's merry.
It's really quite contrary,
It preys on the unwary -
Noctes de mortuis.

The spooks come out to haunt you.
They want to scare and daunt you.
They will be nonchalant - Boo!
Noctes de mortuis.
What do you think?
That's the second best Noctis de Mortuis song I've heard since I've met you.
Thanks... I guess.
It's cunning and it's punning. It's altogether stunning. It's really in the running for the best song of the year!
Touché!
Your songwriting proves clearly that you will have a bright future as a panpipe player.

options.text: Ask About the Noctes de Mortuis

nodes.text: Does anyone know why there are so many ghosts floating around here?
Rumor has it that the magical boundaries between our world and other realms has become unstable. This influx of ghosts from Hades and the Elyseum Fields is just the start...
Or it may just be that this school is haunted.
Yeah - let's hope that's the case. After all, it isn't everyone who gets to live in a spooky old castle like this.
Yeah, people are dying to get here!

options.text: Ask Aeolus to Clean the Room

nodes.text: I like how you cleaned up part of the room. Now could you clean up the rest of your junk off the floor?
I'll get around to it shortly.
Would you please do both of us a favor and clean the junk off the floor? It would be great to walk around the room without worrying what I'm going to step on next.
I'll get to it as soon as I have the time.

If the junk piles on the floor gets any larger, they are going to overflow and fill the room. I don't know about you, but I'd really prefer not to inhale your stinky socks. You could clean it up and avoid asphyxiating us both in our sleep.

When you yell
about the smell
and foretell
our death knell...

And you talk
about my sock
and mock
around the clock...

I confess,
I'd best
divest 
of the mess.
Good night - don't let the Zombies bite.
Sweet dreams - and please, no screams.
